pullrequest.title: add support for 'stopCmd' and 'logsCmd' in simulations, and other changes

content.raw: Hi @preyna, sorry I haven't been following all the latest developments. I've started a round from dev.cloudsim.io (it is using ami-ea56728a), I SSHed into the simulator instance, then pressed the button to play the first run. I'm not sure if there's anything happening, I checked `docker ps` or `docker ps -a` and they don't show anything. What am I missing?
